Description: JOB OBJECTIVE-To maintain and take care of complete requirements of the Mechanical equipments for the mobile refuelling equipment’s,to support effective maintenance and operation of mechanical equipments installations and smooth operation of all mechanical systems across Company’s facility.Skills
Skills: 3-5 years experience in repair and maintenance of mechanical equipments in the operation and supply of Jet Fuel to Aircraft.
Hands-on knowledge in understand and use all measuring equipment such as: Vernier calipers, micrometers, dial gauges.
• Ability to read and interpret operating manuals and standard operating procedures.
• Ability to collaborate and communicate effectively.
